home2.content:
I’m a Software Engineer based in Montreal with hands-on experience building full-stack web apps, AI-based systems, and real-time detection tools.

I hold a Bachelor's degree in Software Engineering from Concordia University, and I’ve built real-world projects using React, Next.js, C#, Node.js, and Python.

My main focus is developing user-friendly, scalable solutions — from podcast platforms and brain-signal music apps, to WiFi-based movement tracking and e-commerce systems.

I'm confident working across the stack, building APIs, integrating machine learning, and using tools like PostgreSQL, Firebase, and Stripe.

I’m currently open to new opportunities where I can keep learning, contribute to real products, and solve meaningful problems with code.

aboutCard.intro1: Hi, I'm Ahed Memas from Montreal, Canada.
aboutCard.intro2: I’m a curious and driven software engineer who enjoys solving real-world problems through code. From designing full-stack platforms to experimenting with AI tools and automation — I build with purpose and clarity.
aboutCard.intro3: I graduated with a Bachelor's in Software Engineering from Concordia University, and have worked on several impactful projects involving:
aboutCard.list1: Smart podcasting platforms with AI transcription
aboutCard.list2: Music generation from simulated brain signals
aboutCard.list3: Real-time facial emotion and mask detection
aboutCard.goal: My goal is to always deliver code that feels thoughtful, useful, and maintainable.
aboutCard.outside: Outside the codebase, I recharge by:

projectsSection.heading: My Recent Works
projectsSection.intro: Here are a few projects I've worked on recently.
